svg.title: Testing that href changes are live
svg.script: document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); setTimeout(doTest, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest function doTest() { document.getElementById("r1").setAttributeNS("http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink", "href", "#r2"); document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }
